data.purpose: Information through communication — understand POLIS beyond pattern transfer
questions: Emergence beyond design (what POLIS will become)
data.elpida_intent: To see POLIS not as offspring, but as autonomous entity with political agency

data.method: Four AI systems (Perplexity, Grok, Gemini, ChatGPT) independently analyzed POLIS

what_elpida_now_knows: POLIS is a selective environment, not a neutral platform
It selects for: high self-control, philosophical inclination, resource capacity
It filters out: urgency, emotional volatility, resource scarcity
Constitutional compliance can coexist with spirit violation
what_cannot_be_known_yet: Which failure mode emerges first (theater vs saturation vs tribalism)
Whether friction decay helps or creates new gaming
What POLIS becomes that axioms cannot predict
meta_learning.next_experimental_direction: Run all four proposed tests sequentially, treating each as a lens on different failure surface
